entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
